name: David's Day Off
description:
David's Day Off

This game was made as a part of the 2023 Indiecade Hidden Heroes Game Jam by 10 Bradley University senior capstone students. It showcases stories from our hero's (David Abzug's) life. In it, the player will fight off enemies in order to save their students from the evil company Evilition.

Full Play Through Credits Design

Adam Jensen - Level designer, Gameplay designer

Isaiah Monk - Narrative designer, Gameplay designer

Programming

Jackson Laumann - Enemy Programmer, Mech programmer

Jacob Welch - Player Programmer,  Player Animator

Luke Hensley - World Programmer, Intractable's

Art

Audrey Blair - Artist, Animator

Kevin Saucedo - 3D Modeler

Paige Fitch - Artist, Animator

Scott Chernobrov - UI, Artist

Sound

Jake Weber - SFX & Music

David Abzug - Voice Lines
